The Horror Harmonica

miscellaneous (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 380
horrormark chance [taint]: 30%
morale bonus [morale]: -2
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #565 Wailing Winds
spell [itemspell]: #1094 Call Horror

Requires 40S25D to forge (S5D4)

As soon as combat starts, the harmonica will start its ominous wail. Everyone who can hear the wailing will feel their spirits sink and their hearts will be gripped with fear. The harmonica is seldom played, because it also summons evil Horrors that will slay everyone in sight.
